thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com | 17 of 236
thread.title: Laura

author: Laura
title: Laura
text:
The shipment of my trees was delayed due to weather, while this would be understandable I feel it was inappropriate that I had to contact them and threaten to open a billing dispute to find out that there was a delay. After this interaction I was treated with respect and courtesy however I feel as though it would have been appropriate for the company to reach out to those waiting for shipment, even a simple mass email explaining the situation would have been nice.
In the end, the trees I received appeared to be in good health but I guess I wont know until this Spring. I could not get the varieties I ordered from Willis in my hometown so I would have had to order from another company. All in all I can say that this is not the worst online shopping experience I have had but it is too soon to tell the true quality of the trees.
